title: 820-3115 3 beeps
message:
this is intermittent
i have run asd and on several occasions it passed
everynow and then doesnt turn on and has 3 beeps.

history is that it had very small corrosion on the side of u1800 rest of board is very clean

title: 820-3115 3 beeps
message: Usually a bad RAM slot, the one closest to the keyboard is the one that mostly causes it. Max out the other slot.

title: 820-3115 3 beeps
message: Yeah. interesting thing is i tried the slots. one in top then one in bottom np. it usually occurs when i do both slots. i will test the slot again. is there any fix for this.

title: 820-3115 3 beeps
message: Sometimes i´ve found 2 or 3 pins not soldered on J3100, check pins 2-6-10-14.....

title: 820-3115 3 beeps
message:
[QUOTE="aprendiz, post: 34063"]Sometimes i´ve found 2 or 3 pins not soldered on J3100, check pins 2-6-10-14.....[/QUOTE]

aprendiz exactly as you said. i noticed recently the macbook when ever you tap it whilst it has a ram in the bottom slot would freeze. after inspecting under microscope i can see there are some cold solder joints. I touched them up and testing now.

thanks

title: 820-3115 3 beeps
message: It usually rips up the traces and "touching" up the solder will just make it work for a bit. I do not recommend to try and fix the BGA bottom slot, you are asking for trouble.

title: 820-3115 3 beeps
message: this one is working great now. customer was mainly concerned for data anways.
